title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.11 - Administration and public areas

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.11 - Administration and public areas

State Regulations

Administration and public areas shall include and
comply with the following: (a) An
entrance at grade level, sheltered from the weather and able to accommodate
wheelchairs. (b) A lobby, which
shall include: (1)
storage space for
wheelchairs; (2)
a reception and
information counter or desk; (3)
waiting space(s); (4)
public toilet
facilities; (5)
public
telephone(s); and
(6)
drinking
fountain(s). (c) Interview space(s) for private interviews relating to social services, credit
and admissions. (d) General or
individual office(s) for business transactions, medical and financial records, and administrative and professional staff. (e) A multi-purpose room for conferences, meetings and health education purposes including facilities for showing visual
aids. (f) Storage for office
equipment and supplies. Notes
